title: Chihuahua City
summary: The city of Chihuahua (Spanish pronunciation: [tʃiˈwawa]) is the state capital of the Mexican state of Chihuahua.[3][1] As of 2017, the city of Chihuahua had a population of 878,062 inhabitants.[2] while the metropolitan area had a population of 1,036,806 inhabitants.[2]
